post.text: It's official: Donald J. Trump just chose Indiana Governor Mike Pence as his running mateâ€”the most extreme vice presidential pick in a generation. Here's what you need to know about him:

comment.author: Melody
comment.text: Gash, what a bunch of whiney crybabies you Hilly/Billy folks are. You all better come up with some ads defending the Crook Hillary. Hurts to know she is worse than Nixon, eh? LMHO!

replies.author: William
replies.text: And yet she's still better than Trump lol

replies.author: Melody
replies.text: Not according to the FBI. Said she lied, obstructed, and was reckless. What a gal! Still riding her man's coattails. Oh Hillary, gonna stand by her mayannn
